de.tud.plt.r43ples.webservice

Class Endpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.plt.r43ples.webservice.Endpoint

  • public class Endpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides SPARQL endpoint via [host]:[port]/r43ples/. Supplies version information, service description as well as SPARQL queries.

      • sparql

        public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response sparql(@HeaderParam(value="Accept")
                               java.lang.String formatHeader,
                               java.lang.String formatQuery,
                               java.lang.String sparqlQuery)
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              org.apache.http.HttpException
        HTTP GET interface for query and update (e.g. SELECT, INSERT, DELETE). Provides HTML form if no query is specified and HTML is requested Provides Service Description if no query is specified and RDF representation is requested
        Parameters:
        formatHeader - format specified in the HTTP header
        formatQuery - format specified in the HTTP parameters
        sparqlQuery - the SPARQL query
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.http.HttpException

        Returns:

      • getServiceDescriptionResponse

        private javax.ws.rs.core.Response getServiceDescriptionResponse(java.lang.String format)
        Provides the SPARQL Endpoint description of the original sparql endpoint with the additional R43ples feature (sd:feature) and replaced URIs.
        Parameters:
        format - serialisation format of the service description
        Returns:
        Extended Service Description
        Throws:
        org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
        java.io.IOException

      • getSelectResponse

        private javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSelectResponse(java.lang.String query,
                                          java.lang.String format)
                                             throws org.apache.http.HttpException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        Produce the response for a SELECT SPARQL query. can handle multiple graphs
        Parameters:
        query - the SPARQL query
        format - the result format
        Returns:
        the response with HTTP header for every graph (revision number and MASTER revision number)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.http.auth.AuthenticationException
        org.apache.http.HttpException

      • getUpdateResponse

        private javax.ws.rs.core.Response getUpdateResponse(java.lang.String query,
                                          java.lang.String user,
                                          java.lang.String commitMessage,
                                          java.lang.String format)
                                             throws org.apache.http.HttpException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        Produce the response for a INSERT or DELETE SPARQL query.
        Parameters:
        query - the SPARQL query containing the update request
        user - user committing the update
        commitMessage - message describing the commit
        format - the result format
        Returns:
        the response with HTTP header for every graph (revision number and MASTER revision number)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.http.HttpException

      • getBranchOrTagResponse

        private javax.ws.rs.core.Response getBranchOrTagResponse(java.lang.String sparqlQuery,
                                               java.lang.String user,
                                               java.lang.String commitMessage,
                                               java.lang.String format)
                                                  throws org.apache.http.HttpException,
                                                         java.io.IOException
        Creates a tag or a branch for a specific graph and revision. Using command "TAG GRAPH REVISION "rev" TO "tag" Using command "BRANCH GRAPH REVISION "rev" TO "tag"
        Parameters:
        sparqlQuery - the SPARQL query
        format - the result format
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.http.auth.AuthenticationException
        org.apache.http.HttpException
